file_content.text: Never thought I'd see Voss and Gormak fighting together.
The more Vaylin terrorizes the galaxy, the stronger her enemies become.
They unite against Vaylin.
Even war has a silver lining.
They'll be at each other's throats the second Vaylin's out of the picture.
It won't last.
So long as they play nice now, I can't complain.
Because Voss are cowards.
Down!
First the Voss curse Gormak home with nightmares. Now they bring curse of the Eternal Fleet--and hide from orbital strikes.
Many run for the shrine. All die. Hiding is the only choice.
I'll draw their fire. When the warships strike, make a run for the shrine.
I'll create a distraction.
Good strategy. You fight like Gormak.
You can risk the Eternal Fleet, or you can take your chances with a point-blank shot. What's it going to be?
Eternal Fleet.
Ha!
Koth!
Thought that was you.
Sorry about the hold-up, Commander.
Miss me?
Thanks for the rescue, Koth. I should have known you'd make a big entrance.
Glad you're here.
We were almost disintegrated, and you're cracking jokes.
Not amused.
Engaging the Eternal Fleet.
No offense, but you look really small from up here.
Hand over the Gravestone, and I'll skip the part of your punishment where we pull out your teeth.
Give me back my ship.
No deal.
Now if you don't mind, I'm off to protect innocent lives.
Typical. We'll deal with Koth later.
Looks like we've got a change of plans...
To the Shrine of Healing!
I guess all it took was a common enemy. We'll have to thank Vaylin.
Took them long enough.
I'll send her some flowers.
Rejoin the battle--or else.
Come down here, and I'll show you how much you're missed.
[Flirt] Let me demonstrate.
Tempting as that sounds, I've got a date with Vaylin's warships.
I'm not your enemy, Koth. Stop pretending to be a hero and help me win this battle.
We don't have to fight.
I don't work with tyrants. Consider this favor a one-time deal.
I see you took a break from saving Zakuulans to dust off the petty insults.
Offense taken.
Zakuul doesn't need me now. Voss does.
You can risk the Eternal Fleet, or you can face my lightsaber. Your choice.
Can we reach the shrine any other way? Hidden paths, underground tunnels?
There must be another path.
No. Pilgrimage path is the only way.
Couldn't let the Gravestone miss all the action. We've got a date with Vaylin's warships.
See anything interesting up there?
How's the view?
Nothing but Skytroopers, explosions, and a whole lotta fire.
Now if you don't mind, I've got a date with Vaylin's warships.
Take care of yourself down there.
Sorry. Just trying to lighten the mood.
Take your grubby hands off my ship, or I'll take it back and use you for a hood ornament.
That's my ship!
Why aren't you advancing on the shrine?
